subject: This Crap is Almost what makes me give up !!!
author: Urkel23
full_text:
http://njprg.com/blog2/?p=31

A show that i had no knowledge of berading me and frank for an hour. At least they could have had us on to defend ourselves. Not knowing what we do at all, most of what they said is based on conjecture and 100% false.

Listen for yourself and see. David Rountree is a huge piece of crap and adds nothing to any field or life for that matter. If you see a picture of him, you would want to punch him repeatedly.....at least that's how i feel.

Dr. Rorke i thought was a good guy, but he's no better than the other skepdickheads.

-Steve H.
